function.name: device_start
function.description: This function is used to start a specific compartment of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to start.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the device.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment related to the device.
